QuestData.Title: Egg Rescue!
QuestData.Description: Eggs. Yes, you heard me right. I said eggs, and these aren't for eating.$B$BHave you ever seen a cloud serpent egg?$B$BThese rare eggs look like jewels, and were once worth their weight in solid gold.$B$BShan'ze Dao to the north normally teems with wild cloud serpents, but the mogu and the sprites have their eggs on lock-down.$B$BWe need to save as many of these precious eggs as we can.$B$BI'm counting on YOU, $n.
